headline.main: ALLIES BOMB SPAN ON FRENCH RIVIERA; Railway Viaduct Near Cannes Is Heavily Damaged by Flying Fortresses

lead_paragraph: ALGIERS, Nov. 1 -- Unable to furnish much close support to the ground forces in Italy because of the weather yesterday, Allied planes continued their strategic attacks on targets far beyond the front line with blows at southern France and Albania.
abstract: US awards for action, Mediterranean Front
snippet: ALGIERS, Nov. 1 -- Unable to furnish much close support to the ground forces in Italy because of the weather yesterday, Allied planes continued their strategic attacks on targets far beyond the front line with blows at southern France and Albania....

byline.original: By Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
